alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 3:27AM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL LEA...WESTERN ANDREWS AND SOUTHERN GAINES COUNTIES THROUGH 515 AM CDT/415 AM MDT/... At 427 AM CDT/327 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Nadine, or 8 miles northeast of Eunice, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Andrews, Eunice, Nadine, Florey, Frankel City, and Andrews County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Southern Lea County
